attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown should resign for gross negligence in running the country, for imposing more than 150 stealth taxes, (copy url into your browser, http://myweb.tiscali.co.uk/garbagegate/item2/stealth.htm )since 1997.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
